name: The Bank Robbery
description:
How to download- after clicking the download button find the file and then unzip the file to get the game  after unzipping folder select the game application and open it.

objective -

you are robbing a bank you have to find the key to get into the vault which is located somewhere in the bank after getting into the vault you will have to escape the bank with out being caught by the police which are patrolling the exit rout 

controls- 

W-Move forward

A-Move right 

S- Move backwards

D- Move right

Spacebar- Jump

Left CTRL- crouch 

E-interact (up on elevator)

R-Down on elevator
